Author: erratic_bonsai
Text: If it was me I’d straight-up tell her to stop trying to force food onto you, that you know how to feed yourself, you know how your body reacts to certain foods, and you know how much food you need before you feel full. If she gets cranky about it that’s her own fault, if she suspects something then she should act like an adult and ask you instead of trying to be sneaky and underhanded about it. Then again I’m kinda aggressive in general so that strategy might be a bit harsh for you?? Idk.
